verses.verse: {A Davidic Psalm: As a Reminder.} {The Outcast Cries Out} d Lord ! Do not rebuke me in your anger; do not correct me in your wrath,
because your arrows have sunk deep into me, and your hand has come down hard on me.
My body is unhealthy due to your anger, and my bones have no rest due to my sin.
My iniquities loom over my head; like a cumbersome burden, they are too heavy for me.
My wounds have putrefied and festered because of my foolishness.
I am bent over and walk about greatly bowed down; all day long I go around mourning.
My insides {Lit. loins} are burning and my body is unhealthy.
I am weak and utterly crushed; I cry out in distress because of my heart's anguish.
Lord, all my longings are before you, and my groaning is not hidden from you.
My heart pounds, my strength fails me, even the gleam in my eye is gone.
As for my friends and my neighbors, they stand aloof from my distress; even my close relatives stand at a distance.
Those who seek my life lay snares for me; those who seek to do me harm brag all day long about their wicked planning.
I am like the deaf, who cannot hear, and like the mute, who cannot open his mouth.
Indeed, I have become like a man who hears nothing, and in whose mouth there is no rebuke.
Because I have placed my hope in you, Lord, you will answer, Lord, my God.
For I said, "Do not let them gloat over me, as they congratulate themselves when my foot slips."
Indeed, I am being set up for a fall, and I am continually reminded of my pain.
I confess my iniquity, and my sin troubles me.

But my enemies are alive and well; {So MT LXX; DSS 4QPs a lack this line} those who hate me {So MT LXX; DSS 4QPs a read Those who are my enemies} for no reason are numerous. {DSS 4QPs a read numerous, and many are those who hate me by deceiving me ; cf. Ps 35:19; 69:5}
They {So LXX DSS 4QPs a ; MT reads And they} reward my good with evil, opposing me because I seek to do good. {So MT; DSS 4QPs a read evil plunder me instead of a good thing}
Don't forsake me, Lord. My God, do not be so distant from me.
Come quickly and help me, Lord, my deliverer.
